revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=DongShanPi |model=One |revision=Development Board |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=33 |est_release_date=02/2022 |type=development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female (Type-C) |cpu1_brand=SigmaStar |cpu1_model=SSD202 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Szxincun |fla1_model=XCSP1AAWH-NT |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=SigmaStar |ram1_model=SSD202 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=5 |serial=yes,, USB Female (Type-C),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB to High Speed Serial Port Chip;Nanjing Qinheng Microelectronics;CH9102F;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2514B;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RGB LCD FPC, UART, IR receiver, Audio 3.5mm jack, I2C, SPI, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2015.01; |stock_os=Linux;4.9.84;buildroot; }} {{TagLine|DongshanPi One Development Board}} :[https://dongshanpi.com/DongshanPi-One/01-BoardIntroduction/ Product page]
{{See also|DongShanPi One SOM}}
===Links=== *[http://linux-chenxing.org/infinity2/dongshanpione/ ''DongShanPi One'' on '''linux-chenxing''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/05/24/dongshanpi-one-a-sigmastar-ssd202d-system-on-module-with-a-mini-pcie-edge-connector-for-gpio-ethernet/ ''DongShanPi One - A SigmaStar SSD202D SoM'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[SigmaStar]] SSD202 @1.2GHz Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A7) *Storage: 256MB (SPI NAND) Flash, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 128MB (DDR3) SDRAM (onchip) *USB: 1x USB Type-C (Host), 4x USB 2.0 ports *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *Power Source: USB Female Type-C
==Images== <gallery> File:DongshanPi One Development Board Top.jpeg|Board Top File:DongshanPi One Development Board Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
